mapper.select: /* 공고목록조회 */ SELECT member_id AS memberId, mentoring_notice_code AS noticeCode, mentoring_notice_title AS noticeTitle, mentoring_mentor_PSBLTY_start_YMD AS noticeStartYmd, mentoring_mentor_PSBLTY_end_YMD AS noticeEndYmd, mentor_notice_REG_YMD AS noticeRegYmd FROM mentoring_notice ORDER BY mentor_notice_REG_YMD DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};
